scripts.postinstall: npm run js:build && npm run js:minify
scripts.fetch:all: npm run fetch:all:native && npm run fetch:all:web
scripts.fetch:all:native: for i in {1..10}; do npm run fetch react-native $i; done
scripts.fetch:all:web: for i in {1..50}; do npm run fetch react-web $i; done
scripts.upload: npm run upload:native && npm run upload:web
scripts.bender:set: git config user.name 'Bender Rodriguez' && git config user.email 'bender@react.parts'
scripts.bender:unset: git config --unset-all user.name && git config --unset-all user.email
scripts.push: git add components && git commit -m 'Update lists of react components' && git push origin master
scripts.update: npm run download:yesterday && npm run parse
scripts.prepare: npm run fetch:all && npm run live
scripts.publish: npm run upload && npm run bender:set && npm run push && npm run bender:unset
